Detailed Description

Implements Poser-style parametric mesh binding.

DzLegacyBinding * DzLegacyBinding::findBinding ( const DzNode *  node,
int *  index = NULL 
) [static, slot]

Searches the given bone for a "DzLegacyBinding" modifier.

Parameters:
node A pointer to the figure to find the skin modifier for.
index This will be set to the index of the skin modifier in the modifiers list, if one is found.
Returns:
A pointer to the figure's skin modifier, NULL if none was found.

void DzLegacyBinding::removeAllJoints (  )  [slot]

Removes all bone bindings from the skin binding. This will remove the bone bindings from the modifier and delete them.

DzError DzLegacyBinding::removeJoint ( int  index  )  [slot]

Removes a bone binding from the skin binding. This will remove the bone binding from the modifier and delete it.

Parameters:

Returns:
DZ_NO_ERROR on success, otherwise an appropriate error code.

void DzLegacyBinding::save ( DzOutFile *  file  )  const [virtual]

Virtual function that is called to allow this object to save itself to the native file format. Reimplemented from DzModifier.

Parameters:
file The file to write the data to.
void DzLegacyBinding::setPointer ( const DzInFile *  file,
short  sectionID,
short  pointerID,
DzBase *  ptr 
) [virtual]

Called by the framework when reading a native file. Reimplemented from DzModifier. This method will be called with the sectionID and pointerID that were given when writing the file out. The passed pointer may be shared so should not be deleted.

Parameters:
file The file being loaded
sectionID The ID of the file section being read
pointerID The ID of the pointer being read.
ptr The pointer being read.
void DzLegacyBinding::setStorablePaths ( const QString &  path  )  [virtual]

Classes that contain items derived from DzStorable should override this method to give them a chance to set their storage path. The path passed is relative (no leading drive letter or root path). Reimplemented from DzModifier.

Parameters:
path The base path for storables.
